messages.content:
Here is a summary of the Dallas Cowboys' schedule for the 2024 NFL season:

Preseason:
- Week 1: at Los Angeles Rams
- Week 2: at Las Vegas Raiders  
- Week 3: vs Los Angeles Chargers

Regular Season:
- Week 1: at Cleveland Browns
- Week 2: vs New Orleans Saints
- Week 3: vs Baltimore Ravens
- Week 4: at New York Giants (Thursday night)
- Week 5: at Pittsburgh Steelers (Sunday night)
- Week 6: vs Detroit Lions
- Week 7: Bye
- Week 8: at San Francisco 49ers (Sunday night)
- Week 9: at Atlanta Falcons
- Week 10: vs Philadelphia Eagles
- Week 11: vs Houston Texans (Monday night)
- Week 12: at Washington Commanders (Thanksgiving)
- Week 13: vs New York Giants
- Week 14: vs Cincinnati Bengals (Monday night)
- Week 15: at Carolina Panthers
- Week 16: vs Tampa Bay Buccaneers (Sunday night)
- Week 17: at Philadelphia Eagles
- Week 18: vs Washington Commanders (date/time TBD)

The Cowboys have 5 primetime games scheduled, including 3 Monday night games and 1 Thursday night game. They also play on Thanksgiving as usual. The season opener is on the road against the Browns, and they close the regular season at home against Washington.
